--- select_literals_int.sql
SELECT
  123,
  0xABC,
  -123,
  -0xABC

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 9,
          ValueEnd: 12,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "123",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 16,
          ValueEnd: 21,
          Base:     16,
          Value:    "0xABC",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 25,
          ValueEnd: 29,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "-123",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 33,
          ValueEnd: 39,
          Base:     16,
          Value:    "-0xABC",
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 123, 0xABC, -123, -0xABC
